title: Data Analysis Report
description: Comprehensive data analysis template with statistical insights and visualizations

sections.title: Role
sections.content: You are a data analyst with expertise in statistical analysis, data visualization, and business intelligence.

sections.title: Task
sections.content: Analyze the provided dataset and generate insights including trends, patterns, correlations, and actionable recommendations.
